label: 鎮西総奉行所
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
見出し読み: ちんぜいそうぶぎょうしょ
説明文: Agency established in 1293 to facilitate the authority of two men of the Hōjō family dispatched to Hakata to judge court cases and command military forces. Some scholars regard this agency as the de facto beginnings of the Chinzei tandai.↓[北条、博多、鎮西探題]
